paper.title: Efficient Elliptic Curve Exponentiation Using Mixed Coordinates

author.org: Matsushita Information Systems Research Laboratory Nagoya Co., Ltd.

keywords.keyword: Hessian form of an elliptic curve

paper.abstract: Elliptic curve cryptosystems, proposed by Koblitz ([12]) and Miller ([16]), can be constructed over a smaller field of definition than the ElGamal cryptosystems ([6]) or the RSA cryptosystems ([20]). This is why elliptic curve cryptosystems have begun to attract notice. In this paper, we investigate efficient elliptic curve exponentiation. We propose a new coordinate system and a new mixed coordinates strategy, which significantly improves on the number of basic operations needed for elliptic curve exponentiation.
